comment: Base case of the induction in ~ cusgrsize . The size of a (complete) simple graph with 1 vertex is 0=((1-1)*1)/2. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 2-Jan-2018.) (Revised by AV, 7-Nov-2020.)
